title: A test post
text:
Stories from data

Let’s set up some data


x = ['A', 'B', 'C']
y = [1, 5, 3]


Now let’s visualize it

plt.bar(x, y)
plt.show()









# test addition
average = sum(y) / len(y)


print(f'Average is {average}')

Average is 3.0
